summary: Las Vegas, nicknamed Sin City, is the biggest city in Nevada. It's famous for gambling, shopping, and entertainment, especially along the Las Vegas Strip. With over 40 million visitors yearly, it's one of the most visited U.S. cities. Known as the "Entertainment Capital of the World," it has many luxurious hotels. Las Vegas was founded in 1905 and has grown rapidly, becoming the most populous North American city founded in the 20th century. Its metropolitan area is large, often including nearby unincorporated communities like Paradise and Winchester.
title: Las Vegas
